2 import rospy
3 from geometry_msgs.msg import PoseStamped
4 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
5 
6 class Switcharoo:
7  def __init__(self):
8  rospy.init_node("republisher_node")
9  self.newMsg = PoseStamped()
10 
11  self.pub = rospy.Publisher("/sa_gv_info", PoseStamped, queue_size=1)
12  self.sub = rospy.Subscriber("/husky/odom", Odometry, self.callback)
13 
14  rospy.spin()
15 
16  def callback(self, msg):
17  self.newMsg.header = msg.header
18  self.newMsg.pose = msg.pose.pose
19  self.pub.publish(self.newMsg)
20 
21 if __name__ == '__main__':
